Package jzombies.defender.condition

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FrequencyCheck
    This class will verify if the number of requests per user less than certain number within one second.
    HttpMethodCheck
    This class will check the method used in http request if it match certain method or not.
    HttpParamLengthCheck
    This Class will check the length of the parameter(s) in a http request if they are less or greater or equals to a certain length
    HttpRegExpMatchCheck
    This class will check if the parameters of http request match to a certain regular expression or not.
    ProtocolCheck
    This class will check if a request uses certain protocol.
    SubCondition  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    HttpParamLengthCheck.OpCode
